text: You are a person, waking up thousands of years after your original cryostasis
It is up to you to find out what happened in the past,
and why humanity seems to be destroyed.
You wake up in a green forest, with glowing fauna and debris scattered around.
Your pod is shattered. By what, you do not know.
You look around, there seems to be nothing around except for scraps.
You try to recall your name, but it comes up empty.
You forgot how old you were when you entered the pods. 35? 40? Or 20? You cannot
recall.
Ughâ€¦ The light's too bright.
You take a while for your eyes to adjust, rubbing your eyes and then opening them.
The air is thick with the scent of sickly Bradford pear blossoms and the saccharine
scent of honeysuckle.
You wrinkle your nose.
English ivy covered the trees, slowly enwrapping the ground and logs with a tight
suffocating embrace.
The ground is brown and murky, cracked in places, but soft underfoot.
There's a newspaper thrown on the ground, muddied and broken by years of wear and
tear
Your eyes catch a quick flashing motion, you see something scurrying across the
ground of the forest.
The hair on your neck started to slowly rise as you stared intently at it.
Blue eyes stare into yours
as if they were analyzing the best places to kill,
decapitate,
and devour your body.
Before you, you see a highway: Chipped and gray, wide and long.
Maybe by going onto the highway, you will find the truth.
Do you:

options: Go Check Your Pod For Oddities
